title: STOP_GAMEPLAY_HINT
content:
0xF46C581C617189160x1BC28B7B// StopGameplayHint
void STOP_GAMEPLAY_HINT(BOOL bStopImmediately);Parameters:bStopImmediately: Specifies whether the gameplay hint camera should stop instantly true or gradually transition out false.Terminates the current gameplay hint camera, with an option for immediate cessation or a gradual fade out.NativeDB Introduced: v323
